body.description: Feature: 1. The powerful MTK6889 processor greatly improves the running speed, frame rate and picture smoothness when playing large games and multitasking. 2.Up to 128GB of expandable storage, supporting simultaneous use of two SIM cards for data and phone calls, or simultaneous use of memory cards for data storage. 3. Face recognition, fingerprint unlock, with Wifi+BT+FM+, bringing you a science fiction experience. 4.6800 mAh large capacity battery and 10W fast charging, no worry about the battery power anymore. 5.High definition camera,Screen 6.7’ HD+ Full Display 1600*3200 Specification: Item Type: Smartphone Colors: Black/Blue/Rose Gold Model: S22 Ultra OS: Android 10 Memory: 2GB Storage: 16GB Screen: 6.7” HD+ Full Screen Battery: 6800 Mah Li-ion Battery CPU: MediaTek MTK6889, 2.6GHz, Rear Camera: 16 MP Front Camera: 32 MP Package Included: 1 x Smartphone, 1 x Charger,1 x Usb-c cable, 1 x Headphones, 1 x User Manual 1 x phone case 1 x Protection filmConnectivity:2G: B2/B3/B5/B833G: B1/B2/B4/B5/B844G: B1/B2/B3/B4/B5/B7/B8/B25/B26/B28A/B28B/B66Please make sure your SIM card belongs to the following operators, otherwise your phone will have no signal.Support CarriersT-Mobile, BTC, MetroPCS, H2O, Movistar, Telcel, Tigo, Claro,Vivacom, Ultra Mobile, lycamobile, Tello Mobile, Bell Wireless, Rogers Wireless, Chatr, Luck Mobile, Virgin Mobile, Fido, FIZZ, Shaw Mobile, etc.𝐃𝐨𝐞𝐬 𝐍𝐎𝐓 work with AT&T, Cricket and CDMA Carriers such as Verizon, Sprint, Boost Mobile, Straight Talk or U.S.Cellular!The storage space can be expanded to 128GB by using TF card/micro SD card.Tip: that it's not a large SD card, it's a micro SD/TF card

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Do not waste money on this phone, It is bad doesnt connect to 5G nor 4G like it claims is very slow and takes forever to boot up definitely not worth the money they are asking and there is better off brand phones on here that work way better

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Scam do not buy it. I don't understand how Amazon is wasting their resources allowing scam items like this one on their website. I bought it just so I can test it out for myself and they don't even try to hide it. Horrible camera, lags when booting, it is a burner smart phone with a S22 case on it.
